Nail-Art Service

Elevate your fingertips with stunning nail art at The East. Express your style in every stroke.

  • Signature Nail Designs 
    Immerse yourself in our collection of signature nail designs that blend the latest trends with timeless classics. From intricate patterns to minimalist elegance, our artists can bring any vision to life
    
                                                                
    • 
                                                                
  • Seasonal Styles
    Celebrate the changing seasons with our curated nail art styles. Whether it's vibrant florals for spring, nautical themes for summer, or cozy hues for fall, we have the perfect designs to complement every season
    • 
                                                                
  • 
                                                                    
    Custom Creations
    Unleash your creativity with custom nail art creations. Consult with our talented nail artists to design a unique masterpiece that reflects your personality and style
    
                                                                
    •
